name: Bitmex Night Theme
description:
Bitmex night theme, by neokami.

Make sure to put bitmex on DARK MODE or it will look weird. Use an extension such as Stylus for Chrome or similar extension for firefox, most of them should work.
additional_info:
Updated 14.03.2018
- Fixes issues with indicator menus


Make sure the extension is enabled for URLs starting with:

https://www.bitmex.com/app
https://static.bitmex.com/assets
https://testnet.bitmex.com/app
https://testnet.static.bitmex.com/assets
